segments.text: A cup of coffee sounds good , doesn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but I think I'll have orange juice first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you feel like having anything to eat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think I'll try the pancakes . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds great . That's just what I feel like having .
segments.speaker: S1
